Uses of Class
gdi.game.WorldObject

Packages that use WorldObject
Package
Description
gdi.game
Classes that are needed to provide the most basic game-world infrastructure
gdi.game.dominion
All classes supporting the Dominion game
gdi.game.map
Classes supporting map-based games.
gdi.game.sprite
Classes supporting sprite-based games.

    Class
    Description
    class 
    gdi.game.Drawable
    A Basic class for all drawable and updatable Objects in the World

    Subclasses of WorldObject in gdi.game.dominion
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    class 
    DominionTile
    A DominionTile represents a single cell ("tile") on the map.
    class 
    Figure
    This class represents an animated Figure.
    class 
    NiceTile
    A MapTile with a basic outline and hover-rendering.
    class 
    WalkingFigure
    A simple figure with a walk animation.

  • Uses of WorldObject in gdi.game.map

    Subclasses of WorldObject in gdi.game.map
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    class 
    MapSprite
    This class handles the connection between a regular Sprite (a graphical entity that can move freely over the world) and a MapTile (an entity representing one tile on a map).
    class 
    MapTile
    This class represent on tile on a Map.
    class 
    WalkingMapSprite
